Does Ubuntu run on any target where an i: I.e. I discovered a few bugs in Speex when ints are 16 bits and I'd like to know if Ubuntu is affected.
I use speex files on Debian Sarge, and they're fine. On which arch will the bug show it's ugly head?
It would only show up on an arch where "int" is 16 bits (sizeof(int)==2 assuming 8-bit chars). The bug showed up on some TI DSPs, but maybe other chips as well.
